actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 with respect to basic educational opportunity grants.

summary.text: Provides that basic educational opportunity grants awarded to students shall not be included in household income and other financial resources to be used as criteria of eligibility for participation by households in the food stamp program.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 with respect to basic educational opportunity grants.
